text.text: Company founder and CEO Frank Basa, P.Eng., a metallurgical engineer and mill expert, has worked with treatment of complex ores for over 30 years. During that time, the Re-2Ox process was conceived and perfected on a variety of feed types to produce client-specific end-products.

Recycling batteries alone is not cost-effective. That's why we initiated a tolling process to appeal to the incumbent collection bodies who want to retain ownership of the metal, while we only provide them with a service.
